name: Sunset Beach
description: A scenic beach perfect for evening strolls and sunset photography.

name: Mountain Peak Trail
description: A popular hiking trail offering panoramic views of the valley.

name: Cultural Heritage Museum
description: Explore local history, artifacts, and rotating exhibits in this beautifully preserved museum.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: A peaceful escape featuring native and exotic plants, waterfalls, and walking paths.

name: Sky Tower
description: An observation tower offering stunning views and a revolving restaurant at the top.

name: Downtown Art District
description: A vibrant neighborhood with galleries, murals, and weekly open studio nights.

name: Riverwalk Park
description: Family-friendly park with riverside trails, picnic areas, and kayak rentals.

name: Tech Innovation Center
description: A hub for startups and tech showcases with interactive exhibits and tours.
